div.p: This value set expansion contains 2 concepts.

td.a: One typhoid dose from primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed-93

tr.td: One typhoid dose from primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed

div.p: "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Typhoid vaccines")

description.value: ValueSet IMMZD18STyphoidTCV for IMMZ.D18.S.Typhoid.TCV schedule. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a typhoid vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Typhoid conjugate vaccine (TCV), 1 dose schedule

code.value: One typhoid dose from primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed-93

display.value: One typhoid dose from primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed
